alert.note: Alert for Lafayette (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 1:49AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lafayette County through 215 AM CDT... At 148 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mayview, or near Oak Grove, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Higginsville, Concordia, Corder, Alma, Blackburn, Mayview, Emma and Aullville. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 40 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
